body.p: I have the honor to request that you will forward on the 20th and the last day of each months to the Adjutant General of the army for the information of this department a full report of the volunteers recruiting services in your state_ setting forth the complete regiments for duty, the number may be completed and the number in process of organization, the names of the Commander and the arm of the service will be specified for each regiment. you are further desired to comply with any request from the Adjutant General of the Army regarding the movement of troops from your state to any army in the field and to regard the same as coming directly from the Secretary of War
